text: The 1961–62 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers men's basketball team represented Western Kentucky State College during the 1961-62 NCAA University Division Basketball season. The Hilltoppers were led by Ohio Valley Conference Coach of the Year Edgar Diddle, in his 40th year as coach, and leading scorer Bobby Rascoe, who averaged more than 25 points per game. The Hilltoppers won the OVC championship, as well as the conference's automatic bid to the 1962 NCAA University Division Basketball Tournament, where they advanced to the Sweet Sixteen.2019-2020 OVC Basketball Media Guide, retrieved 4 May 2020 Rascoe, Darel Carrier, and Harry Todd were named to the all-conference team.
